Description: The Flight into Egypt; the Virgin and Child on a donkey walking towards the left among trees, Joseph on the left. 1624 Plate engraved for printing
Curator's comments: See 1922,0719.5 for corresponding print in the BM, and 1922,0719.3 for further literature on Sezenius' black-work prints.
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / German engravings, etchings and woodcuts c.1400-1700 (3) (cf)
Acquisition notes: Manuscript note bound into the 1878 register: '4 Engraved Copper / Plates by Virgil Solis / sent to me by Mr Doubleday [from the Dept. of Antiquities] / Nov. 1846 / W. H. Carpenter'
